title: Storing Docker Image on GitHub Container Registry
description: Learn how to use GitHub Actions to build Docker images and store them in GitHub Container Registry (ghcr.io). A guide to improving CI/CD workflow for private repositories without exposing source code to servers.

title: Docker Argument vs Variable vs Secret
description: Learn the differences between Docker build arguments, environment variables, and build secrets. Understand when and how to use each for configuring your Docker builds and containers.

title: Dealing With Rejections
description: Rejection is never easy—whether it’s a job you didn’t land or a competition you didn't win, it stings.

title: Tech Stack to Learn for Beginner
description: Let's explore the current competitive tech job market, with tips on popular tech stacks and where to find remotes and relocation opportunities.

title: Simple Trick to Learn Foreign Language
description: A practical guide to make learning a new language feel more natural. Based on observation of common mistakes.

title: Shell Script for CI/CD
description: A hobbyist's guide to simple CI/CD using shell scripts. Covers automating tasks, building Docker images, and deploying containers on a VPS with GitHub Actions.

title: AI for Mock Interview
description: My journey on porting an AI-powered web app for developer interview prep into a desktop app that can be run by anyone on their laptop. The fun and challenges faced during the process will be shared here.

title: Unfair Labor Standard
description: A reflection on Indonesia's job market constraints, focusing on age discrimination and political influence, with a hope for future labor reforms and equality.

title: Too Big To Fail: A Corporation Story
description: This is a story of a corporation aiming to transform into a digital company. Despite investmenting a big sum in new technology and hiring new talents, their efforts are undermined by outdated practices.
